prompts.lifestyle_prompt: Bright, modern home office with white walls and natural daylight streaming in through a window. An A3 Wall Calendar hangs flat on the wall, open to July with a vibrant family holiday photo at top and a clear date grid below. A hand holding a black felt-tip pen is circling a date and writing “Summer BBQ,” highlighting thick paper stock and true-to-life color. Shot from a slight three-quarter angle using a 50mm lens to capture texture and depth in the paper.
prompts.white_bg_prompt: Studio product shot of an A3 Wall Calendar, open to a colorful July spread, presented flat against a PURE WHITE background (#FFFFFF). Soft, even lighting from overhead and side fill reveals paper thickness and vivid photo detail. Front-facing composition with subtle shadow beneath to ground the calendar.
